content.question: The fusion of diverse architectural styles at Petra reflects the

choices.label: lingering legacy of the Persians after conquest by the Greeks
location of the city at intersecting trade routes
influence of the rapid conversion to Islam in the region
multiethnic background of generations of rulers

content.answer: location of the city at intersecting trade routes

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
